<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Selects <tt>length</tt> characters of edit control from the <tt>start</tt> position and places cursor at the end of selection.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> To move cursor only, set <tt>length</tt> to 0. To select text from right to left, use negative <tt>length</tt> (See [[ctrlTextSelection]] for more info)</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control [[ctrlSetTextSelection]] [start, length]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [start, length]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> start: [[Number]] - selection start position
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> length: [[Number]] - length of characters to select (0 to only move the cursor). Negative length will select text from right to left (see example 3)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetTextSelection]] [5, 10]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[disableSerialization]];
[[private]] _ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[createDisplay]] "RscDisplayEmpty" [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscEditMulti", -1]; 
_ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0.5,0.3];
_ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0; 
_ctrl [[ctrlSetText]] "Hello World"; 
_ctrl [[ctrlSetTextSelection]] [6, 5]; // selects World
[[ctrlSetFocus]] _ctrl;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Select text from right to left:<code>_control [[ctrlSetTextSelection]] [5, -4]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlTextSelection]] [[ctrlSetText]]
</value></part></template>
